experience.role: Software Engineer Intern at Zynga Poker
experience.description:
• Coded a Unity client feature allowing for dynamic prefab instantiation from a server-side configuration.
  • Investigated and solved device-specific purchasing bugs by tracing the purchase execution pipeline through the full code stack.
  • Developed a NLP system for automated analysis of game reviews and comprehensive text search written in Python using NLTK Toolkit, SciKit-Learn, imblearn, NumPy, and gensim.
  • Added functionality to an admin tool written in PHP and Javascript with unit tests and feature documentation.

• Implemented and modified A* and Greedy pathfinding algorithms as fundamental game mechanics.
  • Coded and configured the game backend using several Amazon Web Services including DynamoDB, Lambda, APIGateway, CloudWatch, S3, CloudFront, and IAM.
  • Added a secure communication channel between a C# frontend and Python backend using hybrid RSA-AES encryption.

• Designed an architecture for the project using Balsamiq.
  • Implemented a NoSQL database and object to document mapper (Morphia) in MongoDB.
  • Constructed web servlets for file upload, input, validation, and UI display.
